title: Emerging Markets Local Currency Bond Strategy

issues.title: Emerging markets list source not specified
issues.description: 'emerging markets list' referenced but source not identified (MSCI, FTSE, JP Morgan, etc.)
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Countries included in JP Morgan EMBI Global Diversified Index'

issues.title: Minimum credit rating not specified
issues.description: 'minimum credit rating' mentioned but threshold not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Minimum sovereign credit rating of B- (S&P) or B3 (Moody's)'

issues.title: Market depth criteria not defined
issues.description: 'sufficient market depth' is subjective without quantitative threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Minimum $5 billion outstanding local currency government debt and $100 million average daily trading volume'

issues.title: Pricing service not identified
issues.description: 'pricing service' mentioned but vendor not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Bond prices from Bloomberg Generic Prices (BGN) or Interactive Data Evaluated Pricing Service (IDEPS)'

issues.title: Yield calculation methodology not specified
issues.description: 'standard methodology' could mean yield-to-maturity, yield-to-call, or other
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Yield-to-maturity calculated using semi-annual compounding convention or specify country-specific conventions'

issues.title: Credit rating source not specified
issues.description: References credit ratings but doesn't specify rating agency (S&P, Moody's, Fitch)
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Credit ratings from S&P Global Ratings; if unavailable, use Moody's or Fitch composite rating'

issues.title: Trading volume data source not specified
issues.description: Market depth assessment requires volume data but source not identified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Trading volume data from Bloomberg or local exchange reporting'
